channel.title: native / changelog / stable
channel.description: changelog on the stable release channel

item.title: v2.4.0
item.description:
1. fix: iOS load() short-circuit was too greedy
  2. fix(core): ensure load() is called (#1087)
  3. fix(default): standard volume bar in rtl mode
  4. feat(core): add support for dir attr on player container
  5. fix: more precise error when http content in https context
  6. feat(ovp): use comp registry for livecountdown
  7. feat(core): add component registry
  8. fix(playlist): use togglePlay(true) (#1069)

item.title: v2.3.11
item.description:
1. fix(core): fix iOS source preference
  2. feat(hls): set ratio from manifest (#1049)

item.title: v2.3.10
item.description:
1. fix(drm): fix native HLS detection
  2. feat(core): reactive poster attribute
  3. fix(ovp): do not toggle STARTING on countdown
  4. fix(core): force iOS to use synchronous currentSrc updates
  5. fix(core): transform string array source

item.title: v2.3.9
item.description:
1. fix(accessiblity): add focusable attribute for edge
  2. fix(asel): don't modify original array
  3. fix: do not sort sources, break on matched loader
  4. fix: initial language shown in asel sorting

item.title: v2.3.8
item.description:
1. fix(cuepoints): handle empty cuepoint event
  2. feat(asel): add sorting
  3. fix(share): support reactive share config (#1024)
  4. fix(hls): upgrade to hls.js 0.13.1
  5. fix(float-on-scroll): do not leak css on body
  6. fix(core): fix for iOS > 12 autoplay

item.title: v2.3.7
item.description: 1. feat(subtitles): add i18n support to cc.button path (#1016)

item.title: v2.3.6
item.description:
1. fix(fas): automatically handle frame offset on HLS
  2. fix(fas): fine-tune frame accurate seeking
  3. feat(core): support passive event listeners
  4. fix: do not hide poster on starting fullscreen (#996)

item.title: v2.3.5
item.description:
1. fix(dash): always prefer dash.js (#994)
  2. fix(hls): ensure Hls instance destroyed on REAP (#990)
  3. fix: automatically recover on MEDIA_ERR_SRC_NOT_SUPPORTED
  4. feat(share): implement WebShare api (#979)
  5. fix(speed): respect config.speed = false (#978)
  6. fix(core): remove auto_orient support (#976)
